ComicInfo.Summary: Still reeling from her horrifying vision of the walking undead, Shan Beaumont sees herself in the future: Driven mad, just like her father. But she must find the truth. She and a friend Winston visit a modern-day Egyptian cult to find out what Victor Hahn is planning. To stop her, he sends an army of mummified dead but Cleopatra wards off the fiends, and offers to help Shan learn about the Osiris Amulet...and the truth about her past.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-02 20:09:50. [CVDB125306]
ComicInfo.Letterer: Dennis Heisler, Dreamer Design, Mark Roslan, Robin Spehar
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brian Buccellato, Jim Silke, Joe Weems, Romano Molenaar
